{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents discuss intraoral dental xeroradiography, which has been shown to require less radiation compared to conventional intraoral film radiographs. Additionally, the document 'Xeroradiography of dental structures. I. Preliminary investigations.' also mentions that high-quality images were produced at radiation exposures up to seven times less than for conventional intraoral film radiography.
